code: import React from'react';import'./DestinationCard.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DestinationCard=props=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"DestinationCard",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(props.img_url,")")},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"destination",children:props.destination}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"description",children:props.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:'add/'+props.id,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"addToTripBtn",children:"+ Add to Trip"})})]})});};export default DestinationCard;
